Info.Title: All-Round Appraiser Q: The Eyes of Mona Lisa
Info.Writer: Keisuke Matsuoka (based on the novel by), Manabu Uda (screenplay)
Info.Actors: Haruka Ayase, TÃ´ri Matsuzaka, Eriko Hatsune, Hiroaki Murakami
Info.Plot: A store owner and a magazine editor were hired as a temporary employee by The Louvre for a Mona Lisa exhibition to be held in Japan. The two soon discover a hidden puzzle of the Mona Lisa that will change their lives.
